venue.address_2: Exit 19 off Rte. 495. Turn at BKing
venue.name: DOUBLETREE HOTEL

item.description:
Project Smile is a non profit organization dedicated to helping children involved in traumatic events. Since October 2003, Project Smile has donated over 30,000 stuffed animals, coloring books, small toys and reading books to 163 police and fire departments in New England as well as the Mass. Department of Children and Families to help comfort children entering foster care. Many of the children who receive these items were involved in car accidents, witnessed domestic violence, are victims of abuse or other crimes, coping with the loss of a loved one or sick/injured. Project Smile also partners with homeless shelters and donates items for children living in shelters. www.projectsmile.org Project Smile was founded by Catherine, your group organizer.

Join us for a very special event as we celebrate Project Smile's 8th Anniversary. Event features a tremendous silent auction with over 100 items, live music, debut of the 2012 calendar, raffle, appetizers, complimentary glass of wine from Barefoot Wines and cash bar. Tix are only $15 and include a calendar. Tickets can be purchased at www.projectsmile.org/events.htm

Steve Aveson, NECN news anchor and reporter will be the special guest speaker. Miss Massachusetts will also be attending.

Over 100 auction items include: Chillin' with Costa- TV show experience- get behind the scenes at the Billy Costa cooking show with 6 of your friends.

Sam Adams Patriot Brewer certificate- a case of Sam Adams beer per month for a year!

Jet Blue Airline Tickets

Daily Show with Jon Stewart VIP tickets and Colbert Report tickets

F1 Racing tickets 

Pandora Charm Bracelet

Autographed Red Sox, Patriots, Bruins and Celtics items

Autographed Jay Leno items

WEEI Sports Radio, "producer for a day" certificate

Worcester Sharks Experience Package

White rafting trips, restaurant gift certificates, golf outings, limo rides, museum visits, jewelry, gift baskets and more! Your help is needed more than ever, so please join us for a fun evening and help bring a smile to a traumatized child.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) in ballroom
item.name: Wonderful Charity Event Project Smile 8th Anniversary Celebration
